text: In this video,

I'm going to show you where
the best places to land are
on the map Storm Point in Apex Legends
to gain a competitive advantage.

I am going to break this
up into two categories:

where to land to have your
best chances of winning

or where to land if you want
to dive right into the action.
Some of the best locations for you to land

if you're looking for
your best chance to win
are Cenote Cave and Checkpoint.
Cenote Cave is a bit isolated,
so you'll have a good opportunity
to compile some good loot

and make a move towards
the ring or to fight.
It also has multiple pathways
leading towards the center of the map,
making it easier to stay inside the ring

without needing to pass through
other points of interest.
Checkpoint is also a solid drop location.

It doesn't offer as high of
quality loot as Cenote Cave,

but it makes up for it with
the number of wildlife nests
in the nearby area.
By taking down those creatures,
you will be rewarded with loot

alongside a generous amount
of crafting materials.

A few of the best
locations for you to land

if you're looking to dive
right into the action

to eliminate as many
other players as possible
are Command Center and Barometer.

Command Center is located
closer to the center of the map
and is rich with loot

if you can defeat the other
combatants going for it.
Barometer is another location
that'll drop you into fights right away,

since it is easily accessible
for many drop-ship paths.
It has a set of gravity cannons
that offers disengage opportunities

for people that are looking
to grab good loot and escape.
